%usernameusernameuserna%さん！\nお久しぶりです！ 戻ら:
Mr. %usernameusernameuserna%!
It's been a while! You're back!
ああ、める。久しぶり。\n……なかなか顔を出せなくて、ごめんな。:
Ah, I'll stop. It's been a while.
...I'm sorry I couldn't show my face.
い、いえ！ そんな畏まらないでください！\n%usernameusernameu:
N-No! Please don't be so formal!
I'm so relieved that %usernameusernameuserna%-san is doing well!
あ、そういえば、%usernameusernameuserna%さんがいない間に:
Oh, come to think of it, while %usernameusernameuserna%-san was away,
I mined a lot of Tatsumiya Ore! Here's an image!
……うお！？ 凄いな……こんなに掘れたのか。\nこれだけあったら報酬はかなり貰え:
...Whoa?! That's amazing... I didn't know I could dig this much.
With this much, we've been paid quite a bit.
えへへ、%usernameusernameuserna%さんが帰ってきたら、\n:
Ehehe, when %usernameusernameuserna%-san gets back,
I thought I'd get a lot of praise, so we all did our best!
ちゃんと%usernameusernameuserna%さんの分も、\n報酬取り:
I made sure to make enough for %usernameusernameuserna%-san, too.
Here's your share of the reward.
えっ、俺の分も……？\nいいのか？ お前らががんばって稼いだ分だろ。:
Huh? Mine too...?
Are you sure? That's what you guys worked so hard to earn.
いえいえ！ むしろ%usernameusernameuserna%さんと、\n一:
No, no! If anything, I'm with Xenois-san
It's not enough to think about working hard together!
まあ、ラミさんとちゆるさんが、%usernameusernameuserna%さ:
Well, Rami-san and Chiyuru-san, %usernameusernameuserna%-san's money
I said it was my own money, so I took it with me...
……ありがとう、める。\n他のメンバーにも感謝を伝えないとな。:
...Thank you, thank you.
I'll have to thank the other members too.
改めてお帰りなさい、%usernameusernameuserna%さん。\nこ:
Welcome back again, %usernameusernameuserna%.
I look forward to working with you from now on♪
